text: Ovidio Bolognesi (c 1931 – August 2016)http://www.federgolf.it/news/ovidio- bolognesi-ci-lasciati was an Italian professional golfer. He was one of the leading Italian golfers of the 1950s and 1960s, representing Italy five times in the World Cup. He was the professional at Turin Golf Club La Mandria for many years from 1957. His sons Emanuele and Massimo were also professional golfers. ==Professional wins (1)== *1963 Italian Native Open ==Team appearances== *World Cup (representing Italy): 1960, 1962, 1963, 1964, 1967 *Joy Cup (representing the Rest of Europe): 1956 ==References== Category:Italian male golfers Category:Sportspeople from Rome Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths
title: Ovidio Bolognesi
